name: biadanii
params: wff w0, wff w1, wff w2

stmt.origin: mpbi(wb(w0, wa(w1, w2)), wi(w1, wb(w0, w2)))

body.origin:
|- wb(w0, wa(w1, w2))
-| wi(w1, wb(w0, w2))
-| wb(wi(w1, wb(w0, w2)), wb(w0, wa(w1, w2)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(w0, wa(w1, w2))
-| wi(w1, wb(w0, w2))
-| wb(wi(w1, wb(w0, w2)), wb(w0, wa(w1, w2)))

body.origin:
|- wb(wi(w1, wb(w0, w2)), wb(w0, wa(w1, w2)))
-| wi(w0, w1)

comment: Inference associated with ~ biadani . Add a conjunction to an equivalence. (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 20-Jun-2011.) (Proof shortened by BJ, 4-Mar-2023.)
